lead_paragraph: The announcement angered the movement’s Saudi-backed rivals and threatened diplomatic efforts to end a conflict that has ravaged Yemen for nearly two years.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Rick Gladstone from New York.
byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and RICK GLADSTONE

headline.print_headline: Houthis Form a Government in Yemen, Angering Rivals
headline.main: Houthis, in Surprise Move, Form a Government in Yemen

snippet: The announcement angered the movement’s Saudi-backed rivals and threatened diplomatic efforts to end a conflict that has ravaged Yemen for nearly two years....
